description.en:
Navibration is a blockchain-based and smart contract defined navigation system that incorporates vibration that guides users anywhere in the world without the need for Internet connection or maps. The comprehensive guide system includes audio tours that are created by the platform’s users including travelers, local experts, writers, and translators.

NaviCoin will be used to develop the decentralized ecosystem through user incentives commensurate to contributions in a fair, systematic and transparent way to facilitate rapid platform growth.
